definition: currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)

sentences.english: Wengquangou boron-iron deposit occurred within the rocks of Lieryu Formation in Liaohe Group, early Proterozoic.
sentences.chinese: 翁泉溝硼鐵礦牀賦存於早元古宙遼河羣裏爾峪組。

definition: pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago
Paleozoic, geological era 545-250m years ago, covering Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪, Ordovician 奧陶紀|奥陶纪, Silurian 志留紀|志留纪, Devonian 泥盆紀|泥盆纪, Carboniferous 石炭紀|石炭纪, Permian 二疊紀|二叠纪
Permian (geological period 292-250m years ago)/also written 二疊紀|二叠纪
Sinian (c. 800-542 million years ago), late phase of pre-Cambrian geological era
Cryptozoic/geological eon before the appearance of abundant fossils/hidden life, as opposed to Phanerozoic
Ediacaran period (c. 635-542 million years ago), late phase of pre-Cambrian geological era
Phanerozoic, geological eon lasting since the Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪[Han2 wu3 ji4], c. 540m year ago
Holocene (geological period covering approx 12000 years since the last ice age)
